translations: 变魔术，用魔术变出；使某物突然出现（或消失）；想象；使想起；召唤（神灵）；恳求（conjure 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 想起，使在脑海中显现；用魔法召唤

sentences.sentence: Every day a different chef will be conjuring up delicious dishes in the restaurant.
sentences.translation: 该饭店每天都有一位不同的厨师会像变戏法似地做出美味的菜肴。

sentences.sentence: He amused the kids with conjuring tricks.
sentences.translation: 他变戏法逗得孩子们直乐。

sentences.sentence: He is good at conjuring with silver COINS.
